name: NEXUS_CLUSTER_ACCOUNT_USER
content: security.addRole('cluster', 'cluster', 'User with privileges to allow read access to repo content and healtcheck', ['nx-healthcheck-read','nx-repository-view-docker-stackator-docker-browse','nx-repository-view-docker-stackator-docker-read','nx-search-read'],  ['nx-anonymous']); security.addUser('NEXUS_CLUSTER_ACCOUNT_USER', 'Cluster', 'Cluster', 'user@gmail.com', true, 'NEXUS_CLUSTER_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD', ['cluster'])
